trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Kingsland
There were no other sightings in Kingsland on or around April 5th 2010
Summary: Moving Cluster of Lights In Sky, Shot Backwards, Disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the back yard watching the heat lightening. Staring up at the sky, in the distance, I noticed 7 non-flashing, star like, lights moving forward in at separated cluster. Cynical, I kept watching. The cluster of lights rearranged, shot backwards and then completely disappeared from the sky. I immediately ran inside, locked the doors and closed the blinds.
